properties.entry: SELECT C.* FROM CSMIG_CONFIG_TMP C WHERE #C.ID = ?# AND #C.MDSP_PKG LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.CS_OFFER_ID = ?# AND #C.CS_UC_ID = ?# AND #C.ESDP_OFFER_ID = ?# AND #C.ESDP_CAMPAIGN_ID = ?# AND #C.CS_MIGRATOR LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.ESDP_MIGRATOR LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.EXT_OFFER_ID LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.RATEPLAN_ID LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.SERVICE_ID LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.ALLOW_MULTI LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.OFFER_GROUP LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.PACKAGE_ID LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.CS_OFFER_ID2 = ?# AND #C.NAME LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.ALLOWANCE LIKE '%?%'#
SELECT C.* FROM CSMIG_PKG_STATUS C WHERE #C.ID = ?# AND #C.NAME LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.RECONSILE = ?#

SELECT C.* FROM CSMIG_RECONSILE_SUBSCRIBER C WHERE #C.MSISDN = ?# AND #C.STATUS = ?# AND #C.TYPE = ?# AND #C.PKG_COUNT = ?# AND #C.PROCESSOR = ?# AND #C.COMPLETED = ?# AND #C.FAIL_REASON = ?# AND #C.FAIL_MSG LIKE '%?%'#

SELECT C.* FROM CSMIG_RECONSILE_SUBSCRIPTION C WHERE #C.MSISDN = ?# AND #C.INTERVAL_ID = ?# AND #C.EXT_OFFER_ID LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.CAMPAIGN_ID = ?# AND #C.CAMPAIGN_TYPE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.START_DATE = ?# AND #C.LAST_RENEWAL = ?# AND #C.NEXT_RENEWAL = ?# AND #C.LAST_REASON = ?# AND #C.CHARGING_COUNT = ?# AND #C.STATUS = ?# AND #C.CS_OFFER1_ID = ?# AND #C.CS_OFFER2_ID = ?# AND #C.LIMITED_SERVICE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.PROCESS_STATUS = ?# AND #C.PROCESSOR = ?# AND #C.PROCESS_DATE = ?# AND #C.ADDON_COUNT = ?# AND #C.STATUS_UPDATES LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.SOURCE LIKE '%?%'#

SELECT C.* FROM CSMIG_RECONSILE_SUBS_201411112 C WHERE #C.MSISDN = ?# AND #C.INTERVAL_ID = ?# AND #C.EXT_OFFER_ID LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.CAMPAIGN_ID = ?# AND #C.CAMPAIGN_TYPE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.START_DATE = ?# AND #C.LAST_RENEWAL = ?# AND #C.NEXT_RENEWAL = ?# AND #C.LAST_REASON = ?# AND #C.CHARGING_COUNT = ?# AND #C.STATUS = ?# AND #C.CS_OFFER1_ID = ?# AND #C.CS_OFFER2_ID = ?# AND #C.LIMITED_SERVICE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.PROCESS_STATUS = ?# AND #C.PROCESSOR = ?# AND #C.PROCESS_DATE = ?# AND #C.ADDON_COUNT = ?# AND #C.STATUS_UPDATES LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.SOURCE LIKE '%?%'#

SELECT C.* FROM CSMIG_RECONSILE_SUBS_20141111 C WHERE #C.MSISDN = ?# AND #C.INTERVAL_ID = ?# AND #C.EXT_OFFER_ID LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.CAMPAIGN_ID = ?# AND #C.CAMPAIGN_TYPE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.START_DATE = ?# AND #C.LAST_RENEWAL = ?# AND #C.NEXT_RENEWAL = ?# AND #C.LAST_REASON = ?# AND #C.CHARGING_COUNT = ?# AND #C.STATUS = ?# AND #C.CS_OFFER1_ID = ?# AND #C.CS_OFFER2_ID = ?# AND #C.LIMITED_SERVICE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.PROCESS_STATUS = ?# AND #C.PROCESSOR = ?# AND #C.PROCESS_DATE = ?# AND #C.ADDON_COUNT = ?# AND #C.STATUS_UPDATES LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.SOURCE LIKE '%?%'#

SELECT C.* FROM CSMIG_RECONSILE_SUB_20141111 C WHERE #C.MSISDN = ?# AND #C.STATUS = ?# AND #C.TYPE = ?# AND #C.PKG_COUNT = ?# AND #C.PROCESSOR = ?# AND #C.COMPLETED = ?# AND #C.FAIL_REASON = ?# AND #C.FAIL_MSG LIKE '%?%'#
SELECT C.* FROM CS_DESTINATION C WHERE #C.NAME LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.DESTINATION_LIST LIKE '%?%'#

SELECT C.* FROM CS_OFFER_BAC_1_APR C WHERE #C.OFFER_ID = ?# AND #C.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.OFFER_TYPE = ?# AND #C.CREATED_DATE = ?# AND #C.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.ROAMING_TYPE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.OFFER_TELESERVICE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.OFFER_REMARK LIKE '%?%'#
SELECT * FROM CS_OFFER_LOCATION
SELECT C.* FROM CS_OFFER_LOCATION C WHERE #C.NAME LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.LOCATION_ID LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.ID = ?#
SELECT * FROM CS_OFFER

SELECT C.* FROM CS_OFFER_RESOURCE C WHERE #C.ID = ?# AND #C.OFFER_ID_RESOURCE = ?# AND #C.RESOURCE_TYPE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.RESOURCE_ID = ?# AND #C.RESOURCE_UNIT_TYPE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.RESOURCE_TELESERVICE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.APN_VALUE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.MAPPED_RESOURCE_TYPE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.MAPPED_RESOURCE_ID = ?# AND #C.RESOUCE_DESCRIPTION LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.RESOURCE_REMARK LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.RESOURCE_ROAMING_TYPE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.RESOURCE_DESTINATION LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.RESOURCE_FACTOR = ?# AND #C.MAXIMUM_VALUE = ?# AND #C.INFO1 LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.INFO2 LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.INFO3 LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.OFFER_EXIST1 LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.OFFER_MUL_FACTOR LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.INFO4 LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.INFO5 LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.INFO6 LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.INFO7 LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.INFO8 LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.INFO9 LIKE '%?%'#

SELECT C.* FROM CS_OFFER C WHERE #C.OFFER_ID = ?# AND #C.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.OFFER_TYPE = ?# AND #C.CREATED_DATE = ?# AND #C.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.ROAMING_TYPE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.OFFER_TELESERVICE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.OFFER_REMARK LIKE '%?%'#
SELECT * FROM CS_OFFER_TELESERVICE
SELECT C.* FROM CS_OFFER_TELESERVICE C WHERE #C.NAME LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.TELE_ID LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.ID = ?#
SELECT * FROM CS_OFFER_TYPE
SELECT C.* FROM CS_OFFER_TYPE C WHERE #C.OFFER_TYPE_ID = ?# AND #C.OFFER_TYPE_NAME LIKE '%?%'#
SELECT C.* FROM CS_RESOURCES C WHERE #C.ID LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.SERVICE_CLASS LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.NAME LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.RESOURCE_TYPE_ID LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.REC_ID = ?# AND #C.MASK LIKE '%?%'#

SELECT C.* FROM CS_RESOURCE_BAC_1_APR C WHERE #C.ID = ?# AND #C.OFFER_ID_RESOURCE = ?# AND #C.RESOURCE_TYPE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.RESOURCE_ID = ?# AND #C.RESOURCE_UNIT_TYPE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.RESOURCE_TELESERVICE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.APN_VALUE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.MAPPED_RESOURCE_TYPE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.MAPPED_RESOURCE_ID = ?# AND #C.RESOUCE_DESCRIPTION LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.RESOURCE_REMARK LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.RESOURCE_ROAMING_TYPE LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.RESOURCE_DESTINATION LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.RESOURCE_FACTOR = ?# AND #C.MAXIMUM_VALUE = ?# AND #C.INFO1 LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.INFO2 LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.INFO3 LIKE '%?%'#
SELECT * FROM CS_RESOURCE_TYPE
SELECT C.* FROM CS_RESOURCE_TYPE C WHERE #C.NAME LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.RES_TYPE_ID LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.ID = ?#
SELECT * FROM CS_RESOURCE_UNIT_TYPE
SELECT C.* FROM CS_RESOURCE_UNIT_TYPE C WHERE #C.NAME LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.UNIT_ID LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.ID = ?#
SELECT * FROM CS_SERVICE_CLASS
SELECT C.* FROM CS_SERVICE_CLASS C WHERE #C.ID LIKE '%?%'# AND #C.NAME LIKE '%?%'#

SELECT I.* FROM IN_DUMP I WHERE #I.OFFER_ID = ?# AND #I.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%?%'# AND #I.OFFER_TYPE = ?# AND #I.CREATED_DATE = ?# AND #I.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION LIKE '%?%'# AND #I.ROAMING_TYPE LIKE '%?%'# AND #I.OFFER_TELESERVICE LIKE '%?%'# AND #I.OFFER_REMARK LIKE '%?%'# AND #I.ID = ?# AND #I.OFFER_ID_RESOURCE = ?# AND #I.RESOURCE_TYPE LIKE '%?%'# AND #I.RESOURCE_ID = ?# AND #I.RESOURCE_UNIT_TYPE LIKE '%?%'# AND #I.RESOURCE_TELESERVICE LIKE '%?%'# AND #I.APN_VALUE LIKE '%?%'# AND #I.MAPPED_RESOURCE_TYPE LIKE '%?%'# AND #I.MAPPED_RESOURCE_ID = ?# AND #I.RESOUCE_DESCRIPTION LIKE '%?%'# AND #I.RESOURCE_REMARK LIKE '%?%'# AND #I.RESOURCE_ROAMING_TYPE LIKE '%?%'# AND #I.RESOURCE_DESTINATION LIKE '%?%'# AND #I.RESOURCE_FACTOR = ?# AND #I.MAXIMUM_VALUE = ?# AND #I.INFO1 LIKE '%?%'# AND #I.INFO2 LIKE '%?%'# AND #I.INFO3 LIKE '%?%'#
SELECT M.* FROM MOTCY_BUCKET_ITEM_BUCKET M WHERE #M.BUCKET_ID = ?# AND #M.ITEM_ID = ?# AND #M.CREATED = ?# AND #M.CREATED_BY = ?# AND #M.UDPATED = ?# AND #M.UDPATED_BY = ?#
SELECT * FROM MOTCY_BUCKET_ITEM
SELECT M.* FROM MOTCY_BUCKET_ITEM_RES M WHERE #M.ITEM_ID = ?# AND #M.RES_ID = ?# AND #M.CREATED = ?# AND #M.CREATED_BY = ?# AND #M.UDPATED = ?# AND #M.UDPATED_BY = ?#

SELECT M.* FROM MOTCY_BUCKET_ITEM M WHERE #M.ID = ?# AND #M.NAME LIKE '%?%'# AND #M.CREATED = ?# AND #M.CREATED_BY = ?# AND #M.UDPATED = ?# AND #M.UDPATED_BY = ?# AND #M.STATUS = ?# AND #M.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%?%'# AND #M.REMARK LIKE '%?%'#
SELECT * FROM MOTCY_BUCKET

SELECT M.* FROM MOTCY_BUCKET M WHERE #M.ID = ?# AND #M.OFFER_ID = ?# AND #M.TELESERVICE LIKE '%?%'# AND #M.CREATED = ?# AND #M.CREATED_BY = ?# AND #M.UDPATED = ?# AND #M.UDPATED_BY = ?# AND #M.STATUS = ?# AND #M.ROAMING_TYPE LIKE '%?%'#
SELECT M.* FROM MOTCY_CCM M WHERE #M.PROD_IF = ?# AND #M.CCM LIKE '%?%'#
SELECT M.* FROM MOTCY_PRODUCT_BUCKET M WHERE #M.PROD_ID = ?# AND #M.BUCKET_ID = ?# AND #M.CREATED = ?# AND #M.CREATED_BY = ?# AND #M.UDPATED = ?# AND #M.UDPATED_BY = ?#

SELECT M.* FROM MOTCY_PRODUCT_FF M WHERE #M.PROD_ID = ?# AND #M.BUCKET_ID = ?# AND #M.ITEM_ID = ?# AND #M.RES_ID = ?# AND #M.VALUE LIKE '%?%'# AND #M.CREATED = ?# AND #M.CREATED_BY = ?# AND #M.UDPATED = ?# AND #M.UDPATED_BY = ?#
SELECT * FROM MOTCY_PRODUCT

SELECT M.* FROM MOTCY_PRODUCT M WHERE #M.ID = ?# AND #M.NAME LIKE '%?%'# AND #M.OFFER_ID = ?# AND #M.RATEPLAN = ?# AND #M.CREATED = ?# AND #M.CREATED_BY = ?# AND #M.UDPATED = ?# AND #M.UDPATED_BY = ?# AND #M.STATUS = ?# AND #M.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%?%'# AND #M.CMM_ID = ?#
SELECT M.* FROM MOTCY_PROD_RP M WHERE #M.PROD_ID = ?# AND #M.RP_CODE LIKE '%?%'# AND #M.CREATED = ?# AND #M.CREATED_BY = ?# AND #M.UPDATED = ?# AND #M.UPDATED_BY = ?#
SELECT * FROM MOTCY_RATE_PLAN
SELECT M.* FROM MOTCY_RATE_PLAN M WHERE #M.CODE LIKE '%?%'# AND #M.DESCRP LIKE '%?%'# AND #M.SC_GROUP = ?# AND #M.CREATED = ?# AND #M.CREATED_BY = ?# AND #M.UPDATED = ?# AND #M.UPDATED_BY = ?#
SELECT * FROM MOTCY_RESOURCE

SELECT M.* FROM MOTCY_RESOURCE M WHERE #M.ID = ?# AND #M.NAME LIKE '%?%'# AND #M.TYPE = ?# AND #M.UNIT = ?# AND #M.DEFAULT_VAL LIKE '%?%'# AND #M.CREATED = ?# AND #M.CREATED_BY = ?# AND #M.UDPATED = ?# AND #M.UDPATED_BY = ?# AND #M.STATUS = ?# AND #M.SC_GROUP = ?# AND #M.RESOURCE_ID = ?#
SELECT * FROM MOTCY_RES_TYPE
SELECT M.* FROM MOTCY_RES_TYPE M WHERE #M.ID = ?# AND #M.NAME LIKE '%?%'#
SELECT * FROM MOTCY_SC_GROUP
SELECT M.* FROM MOTCY_SC_GROUP M WHERE #M.ID = ?# AND #M.NAME LIKE '%?%'#
SELECT M.* FROM MOTCY_SERVICE_CLASS M WHERE #M.ID = ?# AND #M.NAME LIKE '%?%'# AND #M.SC_GROUP = ?#
SELECT * FROM MOTCY_UNIT_TYPE
SELECT M.* FROM MOTCY_UNIT_TYPE M WHERE #M.ID = ?# AND #M.NAME LIKE '%?%'#
